meanings.definition: A person who delivers goods or packages.
meanings.sent1: The deliveryman brought a package to our door.
meanings.sent2: The deliveryman drives a truck filled with parcels.
meanings.sent3: The deliveryman accidentally delivered a package to the wrong house.
meanings.sent4: The deliveryman is like a modern-day Santa Claus, bringing gifts to people.
meanings.sent5: I always remember the friendly smile of the deliveryman when he drops off our packages.

meanings.definition: A man who is employed to deliver messages or mail.
meanings.sent1: The deliveryman handed me a letter from my friend.
meanings.sent2: The deliveryman cycles around the neighborhood delivering letters.
meanings.sent3: The deliveryman joked that he should start delivering singing telegrams.
meanings.sent4: The deliveryman's bike moves as swiftly as his messages.
meanings.sent5: The deliveryman's uniform makes him easily recognizable on the streets.
